Text.val: --Author: Stephan Huppertz
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Removed public name
30.01.2012 SH SCR17023 Changed BMQ005.PI.LETTER = BPIV_LINENO to BMQ005.PI.IDSP_NO = BPIV_LINENO where
BMQ005 is called to store MQ100
17.01.2012 SH SCR17049 Added 5. Test if batch is still in MQ59
04.08.2010 SH SCR15697 Bug fix in first call of BMQ005 on BTPC level check,
PI.LETTER has to be updated with blank instead BPIV_LINENO
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
17.11.2009 SH SCR15059 Changed tests to call BMQ001 to store MQ245 / 246
17.09.2009 SH SCR14910 Added missing test on BTPC_CHECKCODE > 0
27.08.2009 SH SCR14855 Added MQ246 handling (additional UHRC check)
31.07.2009 SH SCR14775 Added MQ245 handling (UHRC check)
08.05.2007 SH SCR12508 Changed sequence of test to close batch
11.04.2007 SH SCR12431 Extended tests to close batch, in a way if one error is
detected, that further tests to close the batch will be skipped now
08.02.2007 SH SCR12296 Added module to calc SUM(BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH) where
BTCP_STATUS = 1 which is used to update BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH
04.12.2006 SH SCR12122 Disabled locking strategies to avoid MQHD lockings
19.01.2006 SH SCR9755 Removed update of BTCP_USERIOENTER
16.11.2005 SH SCR9488 Adde updated of BTCH_USERTOENTER = user(0) in case
of payments have to be checked
10.10.2005 SH SCR8912 Added new test if payments were handled by junior users,
then the payments have to be apporved by senior users via OMQ100
06.09.2005 SH SCR8912 Removed test on BTCH_NPAYMENTSTOCKECK
06.09.2005 SH SCR8912 Added new test on BTCH_NPAYMENTSTOCKECK, if > 0 then
payments exists which have to be checked by senior users
06.12.2004 Added programs to prepare scanning and final scanning actions if all
payments were handled but documents have to be still scanned
-- Call BPH250 outside of the transaction
-- Submit asynchrone serverjob BPH250
-- If batch was closed it was removed from desktop (OPH201) so we can not locate
on this batch in OPH201 --> Reset to 0
-- 1. Test if all payments are handle
08.02.2007 SH SCR12296 Workaround to get around the DB2 problems with
updating of BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH in the sevaral OPH modules
... if BTCH_TOTABATCHH <> BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH calculate the sum of
BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH where BTCP_STATUS = 1
-- 2. Test documents to scan
.. prepare scanning for documents
.. perform final scanning actions
... in case of scanning isn't finished, batch can't be closed
-- 3. Check if already handled payments have to be approved by senior users
-- If payments have to be checked, delete first already written MQ (100, 245)
rows of the actual batch and then check which payments have to be checked
... delete MQ100
... delete MQ245 (UHRC checks debtor)
... delete MQ246 (UHRC checks bank)
-- 4. Check if batch is already booked (BTCH_STATUS <> 0)
-- 5. Test if batch is still in MQ59
-- Final actions
-- Only if program was called from OPH201 and all payments are already handled
-- ask user to book the batch
-- Close Batch, payments could be booked with BPH250 --> see T.S.
-- Payment has to be approved by senior users, if there exists a checkcode on
BTPC or BPIV level
-- Booking of BTPC row has to be approved by senior users (MQ100)
-- UHRC check (checkcode = 6 or 7)
-- Booking of BPIV row has to be approved by senior users (MQ100)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BTCP where BTCP_BTCH_ID = :2 and BTCP_STATUS = 1 for fetch only
